The all volunteer US-Ukraine Business Council seeks to establish and deepen economic connections and trade between freedom loving peoples. In the context of Russia's horrific invasion, it is vitally important, life-saving work.

Meanwhile, Putin's pawns are everywhere.

Proud to join 58 of my colleagues, including @RepChuyGarcia, @SenWarren, and @RepBeatty, in urging @POTUS and @SecYellen to support a new issuance of SDRs to deliver global crisis relief and protect US jobs at zero cost to taxpayers.

We passed the #BipartisanInfrastructureLaw to help finance big projects that will make a difference in people’s lives—this new $10.7 Million investment means safety and peace of mind for communities between Napoleon, Defiance and all the way to Fort Wayne. toledoblade.com/local/transp…
America is so much better than this orchestrated chaos. Let us stop the fits, delays, and fringe antics. My message is crystal clear—do the work for which the American people have elected us.

Wishing fellow Ohioan and longtime friend David McCall all good things as he becomes President of the United @Steelworkers. Look forward to his leadership to protect and expand the US Steel industry. David knows when unions fight, workers win.

I want to thank @RepMGS for asking about severe impacts of energy program cuts—some are being cut by @HouseGOP between 15% and 40%—below what @POTUS requested, as well as the current spending levels. At the cusp of a new energy frontier for America, history will be the judge.

This week I visited Johnston Fruit Farms in Fulton County, and picked up some apples for @UAW workers I visited later that day in Toledo. Glad to continue to support local growers, and make sure our workers fighting for a better contract have something nutritious to eat.
Wishing a Happy 99th Birthday to President Jimmy Carter! Thank you for all your years of thoughtful service and dedication to our country.

Freedom means never surrender, and the House @UkraineCaucus will never surrender to the whims of an extremist minority who choose tyranny over Liberty. Those who bequeathed Liberty to us knew its worth, and so must we.

Our 92-Member @UkraineCaucus gives no succor to the tyrannical regime of Putin and his butchering legions. We intend to assure that going forward the full will of the American people through the House is expressed in support of Ukraine.
I, along with Members  of our @UkraineCaucus, fully support Ukraine’s quest for territorial sovereignty, independence, and accession to the Western community of democratic nations.

Though this is a hard slap in the face of Liberty, it will not hold going forward. The vast majority of House Members fully support Ukraine—in fact 82%—based on recent votes just this month supporting assistance to Ukraine.

Today, due to a handful of House MAGA extremists, a 45-day extension of US government operations until November 17, was able to briefly halt US assistance for Ukraine inside the 45-day window of that temporary Continuing Resolution.
On the issue of US support for the valiant people and forces fighting for Liberty in Ukraine, the House Ukraine Caucus stands with you.
Then on Monday, the House Rules Committee will continue its hearings on the majority of Appropriation bills that the Republican Leadership has been very late to complete.
Meanwhile, this House Continuing Resolution, which is a temporary measure, now moves to the Senate where I hope it will pass immediately.
So though this short term bill has passed, another vote must occur by 11/17/23 to fund Federal operations going forward, causing more disruption in the operations of our highest levels of government.

The GOP with its thin majority has not been able to perform the basic duties of the Majority Party—to prepare and pass a Budget for FY2024 followed by passage of 12 Departmental and Agency Appropriations’ bills by 9/30/23 to fund the operations of our nation’s Federal Government.
The bill just passed extends the operations of our Federal Government for just a mere 45 days moving forward.

For example, it would have halted pay for our nation’s military forces, taken food from hungry children, furloughed or required work without pay for federal workers handling food inspection, Social Security, flood insurance, passports, Border Patrol, and so much more.

The chaos wrought by a small band of House MAGA extremist Members is very destructive to our country and Congress. Their confusion and intransigence would have gravely harmed our economy and achieved nothing.
Though far from a perfect bipartisan, bicameral bill, the measure just passed temporarily—for 45 days—averts a shutdown of the United States Government.
Statement From Congresswoman Kaptur Following Vote To Pass Continuing Resolution To Fund Government Through November 17:

I work across the aisle to find the Big Middle and deliver for NW OH. Defunding police? Firing teachers? Shuttering #SocialSecurity offices? It’s reckless! @HouseGOP can’t pass their own hurtful legislation to keep government open—@SpeakerMcCarthy do your job—avoid this shutdown!

Sadly, @Steelworkers President Tommy Conway passed away last weekend at 71 years old. Tommy was absolutely committed to making things in America. He fought every single day to protect workers and make sure they had good pay, retirement security, and safety on the job.

Her acute mastery of the energy and water needs of our nation had no comparison. My thoughts and prayers are with her dear daughter Katherine at this trying time. Her loss is truly a great loss for our the nation. Rest in peace my dear friend.

I am deeply saddened at the news of the passing of @SenFeinstein this morning. Dianne and I worked closely over many years to protect the waters of the United States, which are amongst our nations most precious resources. nbcnews.com/news/amp/rcna180…

Let me be clear, funding for the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative is not just about financial aid. It is a testament to our full fledged commitment to a free, sovereign, and democratic nation. To Ukrainians here and abroad, know that the Free World stands with you.

Investing in popular common-sense practices such as cover crops, waste and fertilizer management, and grazing practices, all while continuing to work through existing programs will help producers address other natural resource challenges.
This will lead to economic opportunity for producers, more productive soil, cleaner water and air, healthier wildlife habitat and natural resource conservation for generations to come.

Today @POTUS made $3 Billion available for conservation programs on agricultural lands as part of his Investing in America agenda. This is a major investment that will have a real impact on the Great Lakes Region and America’s Heartland.

This bill strips protections for farmers from “unfair, unjustly discriminatory or deceptive business practices.” Lack of enforcement of the Packers and Stockyards Act and unchecked corporate mergers, enables mega-corporations at the expense of our livestock producers and growers.

Glad to join @FriendsOfOttawa National Wildlife Refuge this evening in DC, as they were honored with an award by the National @WildRefuge Association with wildlife advocates from across America. Look forward to joining you again next year for the @BiggestWeek in American Birding.

Standing up for working people is more than a campaign tagline. It is about service to all the people. Today, @POTUS made history, as the first American President to put people before massive corporate profits and joined @UAW workers in Wayne, Michigan.
Read more here: bryantimes.com/ohio-farm-vet…
Honored to be back in Williams County to present an American flag to Ed Nicokolite a retired Naval Seaman who founded a new chapter of the National Farmer Veteran Coalition.
Wishing a meaningful and easy fast for our friends in Ohio’s Jewish community and around the globe as they observe #YomKippur. #GmarChatimaTovah

Education is an important tool to ensure young men in our communities are raised as allies—this funding for the NW Ohio @YWCAUSA will help build awareness of threats to women including sexual assault, stalking, sex trafficking, domestic and dating violence.toledoblade.com/local/educat…

Joined @DepSecXoch, Mayor @WadeKaps, and members of @ToledoCouncil to announce more than $6 Million in funding from @USDA to plant more than 10,000 new trees. This will bring shade to those who need it and breathe new life into Toledo, and our communities for generations to come.

Democrats passed legislation to lower drug prices without any help from Republicans — now Big Pharma is suing to stop our efforts to lower costs for working Americans and seniors. I support my colleagues in the Senate leading the charge to fight these corporate interests.

Hosted national, regional, and local transit, labor, and civic leaders to discuss the future of rail in Northern Ohio and our Great Lakes Region. Thanks to CEO of @Amtrak Stephen Gardner, @USDOTFRA Administrator Amit Bose, and other leaders who came to NW OH for this roundtable.

I stand firmly behind President Zelenskyy, and the people of @Ukraine in their struggle for Liberty over tyranny in their land. Know that the full support of our @UkraineCaucus is behind you, to do what it takes to win this war.

I applaud the Biden Administration for taking this momentous step, and I look forward to reintroducing my Civilian Climate Corps legislation that will help expand and build on this new effort to help create climate resiliency across our nation.
Statement from the office of Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur:

Joined @UAW Local 12 yesterday in solidarity, to hear first hand what they're fighting for including better salary, better working conditions, and better benefits. When employers post Billions and Billions in profits, Workers deserve a fair share. #1u
A happy and a healthy New Year to our friends in the Jewish community across Ohio, the country, and around the globe celebrating Rosh Hashanah. #LShanaTovah
I come from a union family, and wore pins from my mom and dad who knew the struggle as @UAW members and organizers.
Toledo’s labor roots run deep. Today I visited the hard-working members of @UAW Local 12 on the line as they #StandUp for better pay, good benefits, and a secure retirement.

Honored to receive the Lifetime Achievement Award from the non-partisan Congressional Management Foundation. CMF works to build trust and effectiveness in Congress—strengthening connections between us and the People we serve—grateful to be recognized as a partner in that mission.

I pray for wisdom, fairness, and
speedy resolution to ongoing contract negotiations for the sake of everyone involved and economic progress for our nation.

Tonight, just like our parents, I stand with the @UAW, its officers, and members and share its commitment to betterment of working conditions, fair wages, and health and retiree benefits that are the foundation stones of a living wage and the ladder up to America’s  Middle Class.

For nearly a century, our family has been part of the @UAW family. Our dear father Stephen “Kappy,” retired from Jeep on Central Avenue; our mom helped organize the Champion Spark Plug company negotiating along side Victor Reuther.
I stand full square with the United Auto Workers.

Spoke today about the positive news from the August jobs report—but also about the fights that lie ahead.

If you look at what the @UAW are fighting for, as we are here on the floor, they are fighting for what they have worked for—decent wages, and an earned sense of security.

Thankful to be honored by @CapitolHistory alongside Senator @ChuckGrassley last night, and to take part in a panel discussion moderated by @JaneCampbell53 with House Freshman Class Presidents @RepRobertGarcia and @RepRussellFry. Onward!

Without the #ChildTaxCredit:
❌Child poverty more than doubled from 2021 to 2022
❌Taxes for families of 60 million+ kids went up
❌5 million American kids pushed into poverty

This critical lifeline should've never expired—let's put America's kids first & make the CTC permanent.

Visited the National Museum of the Great Lakes located next to the new MetroPark along Toledo’s East Side Maumee riverbank this weekend. You can feel the neighborhood's momentum! Wonderful guests and visitors including precious toddler Elijah and his caring mother.

Glad to join so many community leaders, including Mayor @WadeKaps, Kid Mayor Gabrielle Mukiira, members of City Council and so many Toledoans to break ground on the new Wayman D. Palmer YMCA—creating a new modern space for families and children to discover endless possibilities.

“Rep Kaptur is right: when properly developed and implemented, TMDLs can be powerful and effective tools to restore impaired and threatened waters." 

The @EPA must utilize every tool available to them in the Clean Water Act to ensure a healthy Lake Erie—our region depends on it.

Today we remember 2,977 souls who lost their lives, and 6,000 wounded 22 years ago on September 11th, 2001. Our nation continues to pay tribute to the selflessness, bravery, and heroism of first responders on that day, and grieve for those lost. We will #NeverForget.

Proud to help welcome @SenSherrodBrown to Toledo for his 6th Annual Ohio Women's Leadership Summit. Honored to present the Canary Award given annually since 2010 to honor women led organizations dedicated to the dignity of work, uplifting working families in our Ohio communities.

Social Security and Medicare are fundamental to our seniors so they know they will enjoy a safe and secure retirement. Rest assured—I will NEVER allow either to be put on the chopping block. Americans work hard for their earned benefits, and I will ALWAYS fight to protect them.

Fulton County is home to a truly world-class fair. I enjoyed meeting with young people in 4H and hearing from local farmers about their priorities as we head into a new Farm Bill. Thank You Fulton County for the warm welcome.

UNION DUES SHOULD BE TAX DEDUCTIBLE.

Pass it on💪

By establishing this new, modern vocational education program at Toledo Technology Academy, we will unlock the boundless potential for our students who are seeking to enter the growing and evolving next-generation automotive industry.
Investing in our students is paramount in everything we do. By thinking beyond the needs of the moment and looking strategically toward what awaits us we are prepared for the days that will come.

Joined @TPSProud Superintendent Durant to highlight $1.25 Million in federal funds for a new TPS Electric Vehicle Center at Toledo Technology Academy of Engineering. Our children are our future, and TPS is the enrichment foundation that sets them on a path toward endless promise.

A generation of US workers have been left behind by lawmakers and presidents—their jobs traded away and offshored, threatening our industrial base. We need to ensure US Steel remains authentically American with domestic ownership and a unionized workforce. cnn.com/2023/08/19/business/…

Beautiful weather for the Toledo #LaborDay Parade. It’s an honor to stand with NW Ohio workers, retirees, and our local unions. As someone who grew up in a union household I know how important solidarity can be—we stand with our trade unions today, and every single day.

To every single worker, today and every day, thank you. Let’s build a future that puts working people first, and ensure that we don’t forget that there is power in a union, and when unions fight, workers win. #1u

On this #LaborDay, let us honor American workers and celebrate the hard-won accomplishments of the labor movement—like the 8-hour workday, and 5-day workweek. As we fight to raise wages and protect the right to organize, we must work to ensure that every worker’s voice is heard.

The blood, sweat, tears, and bravery of men and women who came before us and stood up against powerful forces through collective action, allowed the labor movement in this country to give voice to millions of working people and retirees while ensuring a better country for us all.

This #LaborDay I’m thinking about how the labor movement and unions helped our family to succeed. My mother Anastasia helped organize the Champion Spark Plug plant in Toledo, and my father Stephen labored at the Jeep factory before saving enough to open up a small local grocery.

Fresh water is life, and we must do everything to protect it. 

This summer we welcomed @City_of_Toledo officials to @DCWater to tour their facilities.

With new federal funding opportunities available—we can work together to achieve fresh water for NW Ohio—for decades to come.

Visited @NASAGlenn’s facilities in Northern Ohio with @Astro_Pam including the @NASA Armstrong facility in Sandusky. Our region is home to one of a kind test facilities and the Aerospace Communications Facility — Glenn’s first new building in more than 3 decades.

On this #InternationalOverdoseAwarenessDay—highlighting funding coming to NW Ohio to combat this epidemic, and ensure first responders in rural communities have access to support they need to address mental health and substance abuse they face on the job. toledoblade.com/news/medical…

Supporting STEM education is vital—as students head back to school, I am hosting a 2023 @CongressionalAC, which gives educational opportunities to youth across NW Ohio, to highlight and learn essential coding skills. for additional info visit: CongressionalAppChallenge.us #Congress4CS

I've spent the last 2 days touring @NASAGlenn facilities in Northern Ohio, but that is not the only space news on the horizon. Tonight starting at 8:24 pm Ohioans can look to the skies to see a rare Blue Super Moon, which will not happen again until 2037. wtol.com/article/tech/scienc…

Big Pharma has made record profits for decades on the backs of Americans—the Inflation Reduction Act I voted for is helping to end that. 

Today, @POTUS announced 10 new drugs that will enter into drug price negotiations to bring savings to seniors in Ohio and across our nation.

60 years ago today, Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his famous “I have a dream” speech during the March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom. This landmark moment in the Civil Rights Movement helped lead to the passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and Voting Rights Act of 1965.

Thank you to @DefianceCollege President @RCMankey, VP @DCvpemTaylor, Student Senate President Will Garlock, and other students and faculty for a very informative visit today. Wishing a fruitful Fall semester to all.

A great visit to the Defiance County Fair and the Junior Fair rabbit auction. Happy to be able to meet with @DefCoSheriff Engel, State Rep. Klopfenstein, the Defiance County Commissioners, and farmers on hand.

Joined Mayor @WadeKaps, @City_of_Toledo, @MaumeeValleyH4H and @ToledoUrban_FCU to celebrate the success of the Rooftops Repair Program which makes critical roof repairs in distressed neighborhoods—utilizing nearly $3 Million in American Rescue Plan funding I proudly voted for.
Inspiring community support on display at the East Toledo Family Center open house today. Met with local families, children, and the staff that support them and help them to grow and thrive.

In Montpelier with State Rep. Jim Hoops and State Sen. @Rob_McColley today honoring the heroism and bravery of veterans who put their lives on the line to defend freedom. In honor of their service, we dedicated State Route 107 as Williams County Veterans Memorial Highway.
Whitehouse, OH is celebrating the opening of @DEWESoft. Happy to welcome new tech industry businesses coming to NW Ohio.
When workers stand together, workers win.

Outstanding milkshake and hamburger from local producers at the Sandusky County Fair. Thanks to @OhioAgriculture Director @Baldridge4Ohio, State Sen. @BillReineke, State Rep @ClickForOhio, Commissioner Russ Zimmerman, the Fair Board and local leaders for their hospitality.

The US economy added 187,000 jobs in July—for 30 consecutive months of job growth. Since @POTUS came into office, the United States has added 13.4 million jobs, with 3.5% unemployment remaining near historic low. Ohio has more jobs filled than at any time in the state’s history.
Wishing all students across NW Ohio a good school year full of learning, enrichment, and discovery.

Our @NATO allies the Netherlands and Denmark have pledged to provide Ukraine with 61 F-16’s. With 31 Ohio made Abrams tanks already enroute to the frontline, together our partners in freedom are helping to fight for Liberty in Ukraine against Putin’s criminal war.

A legacy of patriotic service was on display at the 180th Fighter Wing’s Family Day. Thank you to all the families who support our @180thFW and their important mission protecting the skies along our northern border.

The US-Japan-South Korea Trilateral Summit at Camp David is historic. The resolve of our three nations will counter Chinese and North Korean aggression in the region and underscores our commitment to peace for freedom loving people around the world. apnews.com/article/camp-davi…

Thank you for the warm welcome from the Williams County Township Association. Good to be with you this evening to discuss the 2023 Farm Bill, education, and investments in rural broadband infrastructure that will bring modern high-speed internet to communities across NW Ohio.

Brought together State Senator @PaulaHicksHuds1 and State Representative @MicheleGrim at Westbrook Senior Village to discuss issues that impact seniors in our communities. I also highlighted savings seniors can tap into now through the Inflation Reduction Act.

I voted for the #InflationReductionAct to make the cost-of-living more affordable for families in Northwest Ohio—and I won’t stop fighting to lower costs for hardworking families across our region.

I will continue working to bring down health care costs for all people in #OH09.

Parts of Ohio have been left behind for far too long—that’s why I voted to bring modern, high-speed internet infrastructure to communities in NW Ohio. Federal funds can connect thousands of homes to 21st-century technology at low or no cost to you. Visit getinternet.gov.

It was an honor to be able to introduce Ambassador @OMarkarova to so many from across Northern Ohio who have helped to provide aid to Ukrainians in need this past year. The efforts from our communities have helped so many, and will continue to help refugees and all those in need.

Honored to host Ukrainian Ambassador @OMarkarova at Ohio’s General Dynamics Joint Systems Manufacturing Center in Lima. The facility’s @UAW workforce builds new Abrams tanks, some will aid Ukraine’s counteroffensive efforts.

On this 88th anniversary of #SocialSecurity, I am fighting to ensure these hard earned benefits keep up with rising costs. 

While some want to privatize, cut, and end Social Security, Democrats introduced SS 2100 to enhance and expand benefits for years to come. #SocSec88

Good to be in Fulton County to join Mayor David Borer, state, and local leaders and community members to celebrate Fayette’s 150th Anniversary. It was great to see such civic pride from the people of Fayette, and to reconnect with so many longtime friends.

My vote to help seniors on Medicare Part D stay up to date on immunization means no out of pocket cost for vaccines listed below. Stay up to date and talk with your doctor about what is right for you. 

See everything covered here: medicare.gov/about-us/prescr…

Focusing on connecting local farmers with more of their neighbors ensures those in need have food on the table while uplifting the growers and producers who feed us all. 

Thanks to the @USDA, @OhioAgriculture, and @OhioFoodbanks for joining me to visit Johnson Produce in Toledo.

One year ago, the #PACTAct was signed into law, expanding healthcare and benefits for countless veterans and their families harmed by toxic exposure.

On hand today as Springfield Schools dedicated the Everett W. Harris Building. 

Mr. Harris faithfully served his community for over 50 years on the Springfield Township School Board — this dedication pays tribute and honors his many years of service.

When I voted for the Science Act and bipartisan CHIPS Act it was to incentivize investment and production in the USA. Now we are cutting reliance on Chinese suppliers who flood our markets with cheap goods. Imports from China are down 24%. #MakeItInAmerica washingtonpost.com/business/…

Wishing a happy #NationalLighthouseDay to all of our coastal communities across NW Ohio.

Seen here are historic lighthouses from Toledo Harbor, Port Clinton, Marblehead, and Vermilion, but there are many more to see across the coast of Lake Erie.
#Jeepfest celebrates a Toledo tradition of delivering world class products and the great outdoors to the world. Toledo and Jeep — 82 years of excellence!

When I voted to lower Insulin costs for seniors on Medicare as part of the Inflation Reduction Act not a single Republican joined me. Seniors in NW Ohio are now saving as much as $1,307 annually.

3 students from #OH09 were awarded scholarships by Ohio Sea Grant to participate in a week-long science course at Stone Lab. Congratulations to Elizabeth Theobald of Archbold, Macy Ladd of Put-in-Bay, and Alexander Mian of Toledo on this prestigious honor. ohioseagrant.osu.edu/news/20…
A traditional Ukrainian dance performance last night—a parade today—and more to come tomorrow.

On #NationalInternDay—Thank You to all the dedicated interns who serve the people of Northwest Ohio in my DC and district offices.

They work day in and day out to help make sure that your voices are heard.

This year we recognize the 100th anniversary of the Equal Rights Amendment and 60th anniversary of the Equal Pay Act of 1963. Women have made great progress over the past 6 decades—it's not nearly enough. Women in Ohio earn $0.79 for every dollar a man earns. We must do better.

This evening the Frederick Douglass Community Center in Toledo will be hosting the first in a 4 part series to raise awareness about substance abuse in our communities and ways to help address substance abuse disorder. All sessions will be held from 6-7:30 pm. More info below ⬇️
Honored to join @RickSmithShow and @FlyingWithSara of @AFA_CWA last night to talk about how we communicate the work being done to help Union workers across America.
Congratulations to the @Teamsters on this historic win for the Labor movement. When unions fight, workers win. #1u
Today, in the United States Capitol in front of family, friends, and fellow veterans, James Sanders of Wauseon, Ohio was awarded a Bronze Star for his honorable service during the Vietnam War.

Joined today by @DebraShore Administrator of @EPAGreatLakes, and @OhioEPA Director Anne Vogel in Perrysburg, to meet with local farmers and producers to hear firsthand about their efforts and challenges in maintaining soil health and water quality in the Western Lake Erie Basin.

Got my first local bicolor sweet corn of the season grown right here by the Wenz family of Wenz Road. 

Always great to get a chance to support area farmers.

It was a pleasure to meet Jeff Wenz and his son James who attends Maumee High School. 😊

Ohio voters continue to show up to the polls during this critical special election. Early voting provides a great opportunity for every Ohioan to exercise their right to vote. Don’t forget to cast your ballot by mail or in person on or before August 8th! toledoblade.com/local/politi…

Growing up the daughter of a small grocer I know first hand that a grocery store can be the lifeblood of a local community. Efforts by @USDA to crack down on price-gouging and other anticompetitive practices in food and agricultural markets are vital for success of local grocers.
Honored to receive the @HouseDPCC’s John Lewis Award from my friend and colleague @RepJoeNeguse.

An overwhelming majority of Americans support the reforms in the #FreedomToVoteAct including early voting, voting by mail, and a ban on dark money in elections. We must ensure equal access to the ballot box for all.

The Appropriations bill we're looking at today doesn't create American progress. It actually moves us backwards. I don't need back peddlers in the raft today. I want people who are pulling in the same direction and investing, including these resources, to move America forward.

Troubling reports of neonazi and antisemitic groups converging on Sylvania and Toledo this weekend. Such hate has no home in NW Ohio; We stand United against hate and bigotry. toledoblade.com/local/suburb…
Between the rain and heat, weather didn’t dampen the spirits at Toledo’s African American Festival or Lovefest this weekend.

This week @GMA featured Put-In-Bay, Ohio — saying while it might be small, it "packs a punch with tons of summer fun for friends, family, and really anyone just looking for a vacation." Visit @ShoresIslandsOH — experience Americas’s #GreatLakes.

Happy to get a chance to meet with Ohio’s soybean growers when they visited DC earlier this week.
Plaque unveiling honoring the 6 Oddo Brothers of Bellevue, Ohio who all served honorably in the United States Navy.

This week we welcomed the Oddo family of Bellevue, Ohio to Washington to unveil a new plaque at the @NavyMemorial honoring the honorable naval service of the Oddo Brothers. I have also entered their story in the Congressional record to honor their legacy of service to our nation.

While @HouseDemocrats are working hard domestically to expand workforce development, rebuild the economy, lower inflation, and solve problems at home — @POTUS leadership this week in Vilnius, Lithuania ensures that @NATO and our defense alliances are strengthened abroad.

As part of the #NDAA, I've offered an amendment to create a Last Servicemember Standing Medal. This would honor heroes like the late great American soldier, Sergeant John Eade of Toledo, Ohio who are the only surviving soldiers from their regiment. Yesterday, I shared his story.

Tens of millions of Americans rely on this promise during their golden years — but without action — that promise is at risk. Thousands of retirees in Northwestern Ohio want to see a responsible solution to protect Social Security.

For nearly a century, America has made a sacred promise — those who work hard throughout their lives will benefit from the fruits of their labor and of their sacrifice to save for the future. Social Security is an earned benefit and a promise assures a safe and secure retirement.

Today we introduce the Social Security 2100 Act to increase benefits for current and new beneficiaries, protect retirees against inflation and repeal the Windfall Elimination Provision. This important framework will strengthen and preserve America’s bedrock retirement safety net.

Today, I honored the patriotic life of Chief Matt Hanenkrath a pillar of Defiance County, Ohio who ran toward danger to help others. He was a true public servant who embodied the essence of bravery, selflessness, and unwavering commitment to community and country.
This is a sign of historic progress for our fragile, and critical relationships to defend Liberty in Ukraine, and across the western world. washingtonpost.com/world/202…

It is clear that the impacts of climate change are hurting communities like ours across the Heartland and Midwest. With more than 20% of the freshwater on earth in our Great Lakes we need to do everything possible to protect our precious natural resources. insideclimatenews.org/news/0…

Weekend vibes and a sure sign of summer in NW Ohio — let me introduce you to Logan and Lucas who were selling lemonade last night on Secor Road. These WLS McGregor School entrepreneurs have the spirit, drive, good humor, and artistry to move America forward. Onward! Bravo!👏👏👏
Rest assured, I will NEVER allow Social Security or Medicare to be put on the chopping block. Americans worked hard for their earned benefits, and I will ALWAYS fight to protect them.

July is #NationalParkAndRecreationMonth. This is a great time to take advantage of your local parks and green spaces, go on a walk, or have a picnic with family or friends. Your local parks are #WhereCommunityGrows. Be sure to look out for special events near you all month long.
As we gather with family and friends — in NW Ohio and communities across our country — we are reminded that the true meaning of #IndependenceDay is Liberty for all. Enjoy!

Humbled to attend a naturalization ceremony for those becoming new US citizens this #IndependenceDay Weekend. A great honor to participate in an event to recognize those who are becoming a true part of the great American experiment.
You can now receive updates from me and my office on Bluesky.
Just a friendly reminder, you can support good jobs with living wages when you buy union made products for your BBQ’s this July 4th weekend.
